content:
RibbonComboBox Class

Definition

Represents a combo box that is used in a Ribbon control.

In this Article

public class RibbonComboBox : System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton

Remarks

The following illustration shows examples of RibbonComboBox controls that have images and labels, that just have images, and that just have labels.


Ribbon combo box controls

The following illustration shows a RibbonComboBox when the drop-down is opened.


Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open

Properties

IsEditable

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the content of the combo box can be edited.

public bool IsEditable { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the content of the combo box can be edited; otherwise, false. The registered default is false. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field IsEditableProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

IsReadOnly

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether selection-only mode is enabled, in which the contents of the combo box are selectable but not editable.

public bool IsReadOnly { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the contents of the combo box are selectable but not editable; false if the contents of the combo box are not selectable and not editable. The registered default is false. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field IsReadOnlyProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

SelectionBoxItem

Gets the item that is displayed in the selection box.

public object SelectionBoxItem { get; }
Value
Object

The item that is displayed in the selection box. The registered default is an Empty string. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field SelectionBoxItemProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

SelectionBoxItemStringFormat

Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the selected item in the selection box if it is displayed as a string.

public string SelectionBoxItemStringFormat { get; }
Value
String

A composite string that specifies how to format the selected item in the selection box if it is displayed as a string. The registered default is null. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field SelectionBoxItemStringFormatProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

SelectionBoxItemTemplate

Gets the item template of the selection box content.

public System.Windows.DataTemplate SelectionBoxItemTemplate { get; }
Value
DataTemplate

The item template of the selection box content. The registered default is null. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field SelectionBoxItemTemplateProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

SelectionBoxItemTemplateSelector

Gets or sets the custom logic for selecting a DataTemplate that is used to display the stem.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.SelectionBoxItem*.

public System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector SelectionBoxItemTemplateSelector { get; }
Value
DataTemplateSelector

A custom DataTemplateSelector object that provides logic and returns a DataTemplate. The registered default is null. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field SelectionBoxItemTemplateSelectorProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

SelectionBoxWidth

Gets or sets the width of the text box that displays the selected item in the combo box.

public double SelectionBoxWidth { get; set; }
Value
Double

The width of the text box that displays the selected item in the combo box. The registered default is 0.0. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

The SelectionBoxWidth property does not include the widths of the image and label that are associated with the combo box.

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field SelectionBoxWidthProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

ShowKeyboardCues

Gets a value that indicates whether to show the keyboard focus visual for this control.

public bool ShowKeyboardCues { get; }
Value
Boolean

true to show the keyboard focus visual; otherwise, false.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field ShowKeyboardCuesProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

StaysOpenOnEdit

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a combo box that is open and displays a drop-down control will remain open when a user clicks the selection box.

public bool StaysOpenOnEdit { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true to keep the drop-down control open when the user clicks the text area to start editing; otherwise, false. The registered default is false. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field StaysOpenOnEditProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

Text

Gets or sets the text of the currently selected item.

public string Text { get; set; }
Value
String

The text of the item that is displayed in the selection box. The registered default is an String string. For more information about what can influence the value, see Dependency Property Value Precedence.

Remarks

When there is no SelectionBoxItem and IsEditable is true, this property represents the text entered in the text box. When IsEditable is false, this property represents the string version of the selected item.

Dependency Property Information
Identifier field TextProperty
Metadata properties set to true None

Methods

ClearContainerForItemOverride(DependencyObject,Object)

Unloads the container for the specified item.

protected override void ClearContainerForItemOverride (System.Windows.DependencyObject element, object item);
element
DependencyObject

The element that is used to display the item.

item
Object

The item to display from the stem.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items* collection.

Remarks

This method undoes the effects of the PrepareContainerForItemOverride method.

OnActivatingKeyTip(ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs)

Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.

protected override void OnActivatingKeyTip (System.Windows.Controls.ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs e);
e
ActivatingKeyTipEventArgs

Contains data about the activation.

OnApplyTemplate()

Builds the visual tree for the RibbonComboBox when a new template is applied.

public override void OnApplyTemplate ();

Remarks

This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the ApplyTemplate method.

OnCreateAutomationPeer()

Creates a new RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer object for this control.

AutomationPeer

A new automation peer object for this control.

Provides class handling for the KeyUp routed event.

protected override void OnKeyUp (System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e);
e
KeyEventArgs

The event data.

OnLostKeyboardFocus(KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the LostKeyboardFocus routed event.

protected override void OnLostKeyboardFocus (System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e);
e
KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs

The event data.

Provides class handling for the PreviewKeyDown routed event.

e
KeyEventArgs

The event data.

OnPreviewMouseDown(MouseButtonEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the PreviewMouseDown routed event.

protected override void OnPreviewMouseDown (System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e);
e
MouseButtonEventArgs

The event data.

OnTextInput(TextCompositionEventArgs)

Provides class handling for the stem.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput routed attached event.

protected override void OnTextInput (System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs e);
e
TextCompositionEventArgs

The event data.

Remarks

This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event as handled by setting the Handled property of the event data to true. This implementation does not call the base implementation.

PrepareContainerForItemOverride(DependencyObject,Object)

Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.

protected override void PrepareContainerForItemOverride (System.Windows.DependencyObject element, object item);
element
DependencyObject

The element that is used to display the item.

item
Object

The item to display from the stem.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items* collection.
